ygData.subject: Re: What Now?
ygData.msgSnippet: Errr sorry for being such a newbie pain, i just started playing ZZZone entrance? to what crushbone? i went in there and backed out fast centurians all over the
ygData.messageBody:
Errr sorry for being such a newbie pain, i just started playing
ZZZone entrance? to what crushbone?
i went in there and backed out fast
centurians all over the place
and they hate me cause i killed so many pawns :)

Please can you clarify?

Ketryc


King, Darrin wrote:

> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *I am a 5th level elven paladin in Felwithe
> *i am having trouble advancing
> *i tried crushbone but the orc centurians kick my elven butt
> *any advice?
>
> Aye:
> Butcherblok.
>
> Kill large snakes and spiders, you'll progress quickly. You can find them
> easily near the zone entrance, but be wary of the 2 Ogre NPC's who love to
> grind young elves into mush.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: bringing the world together.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
